data.eml:eml: Charmon ramagei sp. nov., a new Charmontinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Reunion, with a synopsis of world species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rousse, Pascal (2013): Charmon ramagei sp. nov., a new Charmontinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Reunion, with a synopsis of world species. Zootaxa 3626 (4): 583-588, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3626.4.12
